contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentLabel: Integrating Headless Shopify with Xperience by Kentico
contentitemdata.kenticocommunity.linkcon.LinkContentShortDescription: Did you hear about Kentico's new 1st party, fully-supported Shopify commerce integration for Xperience by Kentico? Kentico MVP, Liam Goldfinch, gives us his perspective on its support and a step-by-step guide on getting it integrated into a new Xperience by Kentico project.
